wikipedia_page.main: John Paterson (born 14 December 1897 – 11 January 1973) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward.

response: *John Paterson (New York politician) (1744–1808), American soldier and politician
*John Paterson (Cape politician) (1822–1880), politician and businessman of the Cape Colony
